pullrequest.title: add code to set SimbodyCollision::collisionShape and SimbodyCollision::GetBoundingBox()

content.raw:
The code changes look good to me, John.

Unrelated to this change, I noticed nearby that we only specify a Rotation (R_XN) for 
half space contact (PLANE_SHAPE), meaning that the height is always zero.
For the other shapes, we use a Transform (X_LC) which includes an origin point 
in addition to the Rotation. Is this correct as it is, or should we be adding a height
offset also for the plane? (I'll put some code comments at the lines I'm referring to)
content.html:
The code changes look good to me, John.

Unrelated to this change, I noticed nearby that we only specify a Rotation (R_XN) for half space contact (PLANE_SHAPE), meaning that the height is always zero. For the other shapes, we use a Transform (X_LC) which includes an origin point in addition to the Rotation. Is this correct as it is, or should we be adding a height offset also for the plane? (I'll put some code comments at the lines I'm referring to)
